data.text: @wayles2130 @9NewsPerth Big deal. All medications and vaccines have side effects and possible adverse effects. Should we just close all pharmacies? Should we ban cars because some people have car crashes? Here is a list of some adverse effects from paracetamol. https://t.co/KuenarNX0T
@9NewsPerth Can we get news on QANTAS pilots reporting increasing adverse reactions. Is it true CASA are requiring all pilots to wear 24 hour cardiac monitoring devices.
@LesleyM1961 @9NewsPerth Me too and just paid a fortune to get back to Perth. It’s a joke 🤦‍♂️
@liberateWAtoday @9NewsPerth Utterly ridiculous I haven’t been able to see my family in Perth for 2 years & now the air fares are sky high.
@9NewsPerth Why is recovery so slow there ? Is it over population or low IQ  ?
@LesleyM1961 @9NewsPerth Yes, and families have been kept apart for no good reason…
@9NewsPerth What about Pfizers adverse event report? https://t.co/C4d6jGotyu
